entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 4 May 2023
